--- toc: false format: html: include-in-header: hero-image.html #include-after-body: _footer.html sidebar: false anchor-sections: false css: [theme.css, index.css] --- # Welcome to the Dutch Development Economics Network (DUDE) Our mission is to facilitate knowledge exchange and connections among development economists based in the Netherlands. Our Members are researchers at the seven participating universities. We organize two annual Events: a general workshop and a workshop dedicated to PhD students. We are also affiliated to the European Development Economics Group.
*** :::{.column-screen} :::{.column-screen-inset} :::{.home-column-image .col-right} ![](images/Circle%20lens%20dude.png){.home-img-lens} ::: :::{.home-column-text .col-left}

Connect with researchers in the Netherlands working on Development Economics. Seven participating universities in the Netherlands take turns hosting engaging events where we share knowledge and new ideas in the field of Development Economics.

Upcoming events

  • 3rd PhD Workshop, fall 2025, Tinbergen Institute
  • 15th Workshop, spring 2026, Nijmegen University

Recent events

  • 14th Workshop, 27–28 March 2025, Tinbergen Institute
  • 2nd PhD Workshop, 24–25 October 2024, Wageningen University

Images are all publicly shared from past events.

::: ::: ::: :::{.column-screen style="background-color:#B8573E;"} :::{.column-screen-inset} :::{.home-column-image .col-left}

::: :::{.home-column-text .col-right}
